Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Network.Server

Interface ClientHandlerListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Server
public interface ClientHandlerListener
This interface is implemented by the classes which want to listen to the ClientHandler.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clientHandlerGameOver​(ClientHandler clientHandler, boolean endGame)
    This method handles the end of the game of the specified.
    void handleDisconnection​(ClientHandler clientHandler)
    It handles an illegal disconnection of a client.
    void handleFirstConnection​(FirstConnection message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
    This method handles the first connection of each player.
    void setPlayersNumber​(RequestPlayersNumber message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
    This message sets the max number of players chosen by the first player.

  • Method Details

    • handleFirstConnection

      void handleFirstConnection​(FirstConnection message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      This method handles the first connection of each player.
      Parameters:
      message - it contains the username and the color chosen by the player.
      clientHandler - the handler of the client connected to the server.

    • setPlayersNumber

      void setPlayersNumber​(RequestPlayersNumber message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      This message sets the max number of players chosen by the first player.
      Parameters:
      message - it contains the max number of players.
      clientHandler - the ClientHandler who choose the number of players

    • handleDisconnection

      void handleDisconnection​(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      It handles an illegal disconnection of a client. Illegal means that the client disconnects after being added to the game's players but when the game isn't finished yet.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the client who disconnected.

    • clientHandlerGameOver

      void clientHandlerGameOver​(ClientHandler clientHandler, boolean endGame)
      This method handles the end of the game of the specified.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the clientHandler
      endGame - if the game is ended.
